name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 8, under a video about Moody's downgrading the ratings of Hong Kong and Chinese companies, netizens expressed their support for Moody's

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, the Xi'an police said that they had terminated the labor contract with the female auxiliary police officer who threatened to open the box of others, and at the same time punished her direct superior.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution, a biography of Lin Huiyin published in Taiwan in the Renmin University Library

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 5, Qingdao, Shandong.
A delivery man had an argument with a security guard because he rode his bike into a residential area, and the security guard then stabbed the delivery man several times.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up of "Blood Trough Sister"
On December 8, the Shanghai Internet Information Office and relevant platforms investigated and dealt with a number of accounts involved in "Blood Trough Sister" related rumors and human flesh cyberbullying.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"From difficulty finding a kindergarten to difficulty finding a child"
On December 8, the Hunan Provincial Department of Education issued a document requiring "orderly organization of kindergarten establishment, merger, transfer and withdrawal." This is the first time that a provincial government has formally proposed the withdrawal of kindergartens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"A man said he picked up a dog on the road and took it home, and was detained by the police. The man's father said: It's theft, we don't have a good attitude to admit guilt, so we are detained for 13 days. "The child will take the career exam in a few days." 
On December 7, a netizen posted a post asking for help, saying that on the evening of the 3rd, he met an unmanned pet dog Samoyed near the Beigao Town Government of Wei County, Handan City, and took it home. Later, the police station summoned him and accused him of theft. 
Mr. Jiang, the father of the person involved, said, "It is true, and the child has been detained." He believed that the child picked up the ownerless dog on the road, not stolen from somewhere else. If the dog owner came and took it away, how could it be considered theft? 
Mr. Jiang said that on the 5th, the police asked him to send the dog to the police station. He argued with the other party for a few words, and the police station rushed to his home on the same day to seize the dog. 
The child was detained on the 7th, and the police did not issue them any relevant procedures. "It was said that we didn't have a good attitude to admit guilt, and we were detained for 13 days." 
What made him even more unacceptable was that his son would take the career exam in a few days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 9, Jining City, Shandong Province. The Chengtou Baoli and Guangyuhu companies owed workers wages, and the workers held banners at the company gates to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens collectively commented “Awesome” under the relevant notice of Shanghai Internet Information Office

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 5, Shanxi. A woman posted a video claiming to be a public official, reporting the former director of Liulin County Market Supervision and Administration Bureau, Li Qiang, and the current director, Li Zhonghu, by real name.
The woman said that Li Qiang accepted bribes during his tenure and continued to do so after retirement. The current director, Li Zhonghu, is Li Qiang's younger brother, who also accepted bribes and played with women.
On December 7, the Liulin County Information Office in Shanxi issued a notice stating that a joint investigation team had been set up to investigate and verify the relevant situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of December 8, in Maoming, Guangdong, a white car suddenly hit a food delivery guy who was using his phone on the roadside.
The driver then got out of the car and walked away quickly, leaving his wife in the back seat kneeling on the ground to beg for mercy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of December 9, deliverymen from Qingdao, Shandong gathered in the community where the incident occurred, but were later persuaded to leave by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 7, several lawyers broke the news through different channels that a dramatic scene occurred during a bribery case that was openly tried at the Neijiang Intermediate People's Court in Sichuan Province that day: a criminal ruling from the Provincial High Court presented by the defense lawyer showed that the presiding judge Liu, who was presiding over the court trial, had been confirmed by the Sichuan Provincial High Court to have engaged in bribery.
On December 8, Chiyan News verified this with the relevant departments of Neijiang City. As of press time, the relevant departments of Neijiang City have not yet responded to this matter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: That afternoon, some people threw paper money and the deliverymen around shouted "Awesome!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 5, a fire broke out at the BYD sales center in Pengjiang District, Jiangmen City.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 9, a counselor at a Shanghai university issued a statement reminding students not to celebrate Christmas, saying that "Christmas Eve", "Christmas" and "Carnival Night" were all set up by the Eight-Nation Alliance to celebrate the capture of Beijing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Since this semester, a large number of small animals have been killed in cruel ways at Huzhou Normal University. With the spontaneous efforts of the students, the school and the police have agreed to catch the murderer, but will not make it public, only saying that they will be criticized and educated.
